meanings: (목숨을) kill, take sb's life, (살해하다) murder, (informal) knock sb off, (신문·문학 용어) slay, (학살하다) slaughter, butcher, ...
Verb bring down, make something blunt

meanings.meaning: One murder makes a villain, millions a hero.

vlive.korean: 기어올라? 기어올라? 애매하게 죽이면? Do I fight back if he lets me live? 듣기 View video 심포유 - my SMTelevision : [심포유 #첸] EP18 #천생사랑꾼 #뜻밖의공통점 #사람잡는두성
vlive.english: Do I fight back if he lets me live?

vlive.korean: 너무 싫어 - 진영이 형부터 죽이면 안 돼 그러면? I hate it. - Let's kill JINYOUNG first. 듣기 View video Dispatch : [ⓓxV] “환상의 대똥촉파티(Feat. 마피아게임)” (갓세븐 : GOT7)
vlive.english: I hate it. - Let's kill JINYOUNG first.

vlive.korean: 죽이면 안 된다 - 당연하지 근데 일주일에 물 몇 번 주는지 알아? Please don't kill it. - Of course. Do you know how many times I have to water it? 듣기 View video 잼플리 Jamfully : 여사친과 썸 탈 때 씁쓸한 순간 [썸타는일주일] EP.03
vlive.english: Please don't kill it. - Of course. Do you know how many times I have to water it?

vlive.korean: 박쥐를 죽이면 어떡해? How could you kill the bat? 듣기 View video ASTRO : 연 날리기😆
vlive.english: How could you kill the bat?

vlive.korean: 다 죽이면 돼요 이 사람들. All you have to do is kill these people. 듣기 View video MOMO X : [배틀 플레이리스트] PC방에서 전투력 올리는 플레이리스트 드림캐쳐 시연&유현 편
vlive.english: All you have to do is kill these people.

examples.korean: One murder makes a villain, millions a hero. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 한 사람을 죽이면 악한이 되지만, 백만명을 죽이면 영웅이 된다. (서양속담, 도전속담) 명언/속담
examples.english: One murder makes a villain, millions a hero. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The first month a vampire appeared, it would kill one human, turning him or her into a fellow vampire. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 흡혈귀가 나타난 첫 번째 달에 한 사람을 죽이면 이 사람도 흡혈귀가 된다. Neungyule
examples.english: The first month a vampire appeared, it would kill one human, turning him or her into a fellow vampire. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The mayor of New York City, Michael Bloomberg, also does not support the game because it rewards players for injuring or killing police officers. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 뉴욕시 시장 마이클 블룸버그도, 이 게임이 플레이어들에게 경찰관들에게 부상을 입히거나 죽이면 보상을 주기 때문에 이 게임을 지지하지 않는다. Neungyule
examples.english: The mayor of New York City, Michael Bloomberg, also does not support the game because it rewards players for injuring or killing police officers. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: No, stop! You can’t kill a spider in the morning. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 안돼, 멈춰! 아침에 거미를 죽이면 안돼. TIMES CORE
examples.english: No, stop! You can’t kill a spider in the morning. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: We shouldn’t kill them with experiments. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 우리는 실험으로 동물들을 죽이면 안돼. TIMES CORE
examples.english: We shouldn’t kill them with experiments. Add to Wordbook
